channel.title: God its been a long time
channel.description:
[img]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/9986/10226343.png[/img]
Really not tried anything in a while, just trying to retrain myself to a somewhat OK level. Just so you know, Naphta is my username on pretty much every other forum I use.

item.title: God its been a long time
item.dc:creator: @YupolaScape YupolaScape
item.description:
@YupolaScape wrote:

Not really a focal imho. The focal is what separating the two contrasting colours; white and black.

Read full topic
item.source: God its been a long time

item.title: God its been a long time
item.dc:creator: @specs specs
item.description:
@specs wrote:

YupolaScape:

It didn’t used to be center focused, I make the width shorter as it didnt look right. I also tried the text on the tail but I thought i’d go for the generic corner text

The right side is black, so now it’s a double focal, which you don’t want. Hopefully.

Read full topic
item.source: God its been a long time

item.title: God its been a long time
item.dc:creator: @specs specs
item.description:
@specs wrote:

Never put text in the corner, and don’t use borders either. It’s LQ, and the focal is centered, which kills the depth.

Read full topic
